TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceEndpointCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>
Public Class ServiceEndpointCollection Inherits Collection(Of ServiceEndpoint)

summary.span: 包含服務的端點的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the endpoints for a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個服務端點的集合是由中繼資料 API 用於管理具有多個端點的服務。This collection of endpoints for a service is used by the metadata API to manage services with multiple endpoints. 例如，當從 WSDL 連接埠型別建立服務端點時，會由 屬性和 方法傳回 。 is returned, for example, by the property and by the method when creating service endpoints from WSDL port types. 此集合提供 尋找具有特定名稱或位址之特定型別端點的能力；或是提供 尋找符合指定合約類型或名稱準則之服務端點的能力。The collection provides the functionality to the endpoints of a particular type, that have a specific name or address, or to of the endpoints for a service that meet a specified contract type or name criteria. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 和 方法來列舉符合各種搜尋準則的 物件。The following example illustrates the use of the and methods to enumerate objects that satisfy various search criteria. [!code-csharp[ServiceEndpointCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/serviceendpointcollection/cs/proxy.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceEndpointCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/serviceendpointcollection/cs/serviceendpointcollection.service.overview.cs#1)]

summary.span: 傳回從服務端點的集合所找到第一個符合特定準則的服務端點。

span.span: Returns the first service endpoint found that satisfies specific criteria from the collection of service endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能會有多個端點符合此準則。There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria. 此方法會傳回集合中遇到的第一個符合項目。The method returns the first one encountered in the collection. 如果您需要尋找符合指定之準則的所有 物件，請改用其中一個 方法。If you need to find all of the objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the methods instead.

span.span: The of contract for the service endpoint.

summary.span: 傳回從服務端點的集合所找到第一個符合指定的合約型別的服務端點。

span.span: Returns the first service endpoint found that satisfies the specified contract type from the collection of service endpoints.

returns.span: 指定之合約型別的第一個 ，如果找不到則為 。

span.span: The first of the specified contract type or if none was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個 多載是 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 程式撰寫模型特定的。This overload is specific to the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] programming model. 它會查看每個端點的 屬性。It looks at the property for each endpoint. 可能`null`如果不是從 WCF 程式設計模型 (類型 \* 合約屬性)。The may be `null` if the was not created from the WCF programming model (types with \*Contract attributes). 可能會有多個端點符合此準則。There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria. 此方法會傳回集合中遇到的第一個符合項目。The method returns the first one encountered in the collection. 如果您需要尋找符合指定之準則的所有 物件，請改用其中一個 方法。If you need to find all of the objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the methods instead.

span.span: is .

span.span: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫定義於基底類別中的虛擬 方法，提供這個方法以執行可確保 `null` 值未插入集合中的輸入驗證。This method overrides the virtual method defined in the base class and is provided to do input validation that ensures `null` values are not inserted into the collection. 它並非設計為由使用者來呼叫。It is not intended to be called by users.

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 大於包含在集合中的項目數目。

span.span: is greater than the number of items contained in the collection.
